attributes.additional_details:
John T. McAleese
23 years service within the British Army,59 Independent Commando Squadron,Royal Engineers , 17 of which were with 22 SAS Regiment.
During his service with the SAS he planned and took part in many special operations in almost every part of the world.Played a key role in the recapture of the Iranian Embassy in May 1980 in London.
He is one the the last true Heroes.
British Government must honour him and treat him as he deserves.
